mapper.select: SELECT /* Ara2Usr.selectItemInfo */ A.USR_NO , A.USR_ID , A.USR_NM , A.REL_STR_NO , A1.TEL_NM , A1.TEL_NUM , A2.MBL_NM , A2.MBL_NUM , A3.EML_NM , A3.EML_ADDR , A4.BNK_NM , A4.BNK_ACNT , A4.ACNT_NM , A5.MRRG_DT , A5.MRRG_LOC FROM ARA2_USR A LEFT JOIN ARA2_TEL A1 ON A1.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A1.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_MBL A2 ON A2.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A2.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_EML A3 ON A3.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A3.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_BNK A4 ON A4.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A4.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_MRRG A5 ON A5.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A5.ITM_TYP = 'USR' WHERE 1=1 AND A.USR_NO = #{usrid}

SELECT /* Ara2Usr.selectStateCpnList */ A.CAMP_NO , A.ITM_NO , A.ITM_TYP , A.CPN_PHS , A1.CD_DESC , A.CPN_MST , A.CPN_TYP , A.CPN_MNY , A.CPN_NO , A.CPN_CNTNT , TO_CHAR(A.CRE_DTTM, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CRE_DTTM , TO_CHAR(A.UPD_DTTM, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS UPD_DTTM , B.CAMP_NM , B.CAMP_PHS , B1.CD_DESC AS CAMP_CD_DESC , TO_CHAR(B.BGN_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS CAMP_BGN_DT , TO_CHAR(B.END_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS CAMP_END_DT FROM ARA2_CPN A LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE A1 ON A1.GRP_CD = 'C002' AND A1.CODE = A.CPN_PHS , ARA2_CAMP B LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE B1 ON B1.GRP_CD = 'C012' AND B1.CODE = B.CAMP_PHS WHERE 1=1 AND B.CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO AND A.ITM_NO = #{usrid} AND A.ITM_TYP = 'USR' ORDER BY A.CPN_MNY DESC , A.CPN_NO ASC

SELECT /* Ara2Usr.selectUseCpnList */ A.CAMP_NO , A.ITM_NO , A.ITM_TYP , A.CPN_PHS , A1.CD_DESC , A.CPN_MST , A.CPN_TYP , A.CPN_MNY , A.CPN_NO , A.CPN_CNTNT , TO_CHAR(A.CRE_DTTM, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CRE_DTTM , TO_CHAR(A.UPD_DTTM, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS UPD_DTTM , B.CAMP_NM , B.CAMP_PHS , B1.CD_DESC AS CAMP_CD_DESC , TO_CHAR(B.BGN_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS CAMP_BGN_DT , TO_CHAR(B.END_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS CAMP_END_DT FROM ARA2_CPN A LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE A1 ON A1.GRP_CD = 'C002' AND A1.CODE = A.CPN_PHS , ARA2_CAMP B LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE B1 ON B1.GRP_CD = 'C012' AND B1.CODE = B.CAMP_PHS WHERE 1=1 AND B.CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO AND A.ITM_NO = #{usrid} AND A.ITM_TYP = 'USR' ORDER BY A.CPN_MNY DESC , A.CPN_NO ASC
